predicate.note: Frames file for 'side' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: pretty simple
example.text: Eastern has disputed the claim, but a federal district court, an appeals court and now the arbitrator have all sided with the pilots.
example.arg: a federal district court, an appeals court and now the arbitrator

roleset.name: put siding on a house

example.name: somewhat artificial
example.text: John sided his house with old newspapers.

roleset.note: This is here mostly to set up the nominalization "vinyl siding".
